name: Adelaide Backpackers and Travellers inn
description:
This Adelaide Backpackers is located on the West End of Hindley Street, Adelaide CBD. Offering mostly 4 bed dorms, 4 bed dorms with Ensuite, some great sized private rooms with bathroom, basic kitchenette. There are single rooms, a twin room Ensuite, and a couple of budget 6 bed dorms. Passport is required for check-in.

Adelaide Backpackers is known for:
•	Adelaide CBD location with easy access to cafes, restaurants, shopping, and major attractions
•	shared and private accommodation, some with kitchenettes and bathrooms
•	communal kitchen: prepare meals and socialise.
•	on-site laundry facilities
•	free Wi-Fi throughout the hostel to stay connected.
•	friendly and welcoming staff known for their warmth and local knowledge.
•	travel advice booking local tours and activities.
•	maintaining a clean and comfortable environment for all guests.
Whether you're solo or traveling with your friends, we've got a variety of rooms – from shared dorms to private rooms. Some come with private bathrooms and kitchenettes. Plus, our shared kitchen is a great spot to cook up your favourite dishes and chat with fellow travellers. You’re right on the doorstep to the legendary Adelaide Central Markets well-known for the freshest produce, local eats and an excellent array of international foods. There are several restaurants, pubs, cafes, nearby supermarkets and 5 minutes’ walk to Hindley Streets late night venues.
Adelaide's free bus and tram service is conveniently located near the hostel, making it super easy to navigate the city.
Our hostel is more than just a place to sleep. It's a community, a place to meet fellow travellers from around the world, and an opportunity to create unforgettable memories. Whether you're here to find work, visit famous tourist spots or just soak up the local culture, Adelaide Backpackers on Hindley Street is the perfect base for your adventure in Adelaide. We can't wait to welcome you!
Pack your bags and come on over to the Adelaide Backpackers on Hindley Street. We're excited to meet you and make your stay in Adelaide amazing. See you soon! 

Standard Bookings come with free cancellation up to 24 hours before check in
No Show bookings subject to being charged for first nights stay
Age Restriction
Taxes Included
Reception hours are 10am - 2.00pm and 5.00pm - 7.00pm,
Late check-ins can be organized if requested with ample notice prior to arrival.
Online bookings after 6.00pm will not be honoured.
Passport required for all guests on check in.
No refunds designated for non refundable rates
No stress
